Title: Establishes the New York state renewable reclamation projects program
Summary: Establishes the New York state renewable reclamation projects program to stimulate the development of renewable energy on certain brownfield sites, dormant electric generating sites, and real property.
LawCode: Add ยง66-u, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to renewable energy projects on brownfield sites, dormant electric generating sites and utility owned property
